channel.title: Pietro Aretino on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Pietro Aretino on Artangled

item.title: Pietro Aretino and the Art of the Renaissance | Uffizi
item.description: This is an unusual visual art exhibition, in that it’s not based on the work of a visual artist. Instead, Pietro Aretino was an epic networker, a friend to the stars who worked himself up from humble beginnings to great power in early 16th century Italy. I’d first heard of him on the Bad Gays podcast - Aretino being a proud self-described “sodomite” - which termed him “the original Regina George of the Italian high Renaissance”.
